item.description:
Lots happening this month! First off, we will have signature papers and instructions for Citizen Petition ballot initiatives - Voter ID, Repeal the Individual Mandate and more!

We will also have a few guests - 

Les Gosule, advocate of Melissa's Bill, named for his daughter, will discuss his efforts to eliminate parole for those convicts sentenced to life terms in MA prisons. Lee will be joined by Jay Dwyer of the Waltham Tea Party.

Raymond Hanna of ACTBoston, Act for America

We will also be welcoming videographer Harry Mentas. He is looking for volunteers to tape interviews for his "Faces of the Tea Party" project.

See you Wednesday in Holbrook!
item.name: October Holbrook Meeting - Greater Boston Tea Party
